game.name: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
game.desc: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne is a fan-made game inspired by the classic Community episode Digital Estate Planning in which the study group finds itself living inside an old-school video game, this independently-produced 2D platformer features Jeff Winger, Britta, Abed, Shirley, Annie, Troy and Pierce as 8-bit gaming characters.
